Text: This movie, documentary is oh-so-good, especially if you are studying biology, or synthetic biology, or computers, or just about anything that has to do with sciences, including math, or if you just want to be entertained, while learning about the spider-goat new species, or about (not creating, but) re-booting life, and a new species created ,whose father and mother were...a computer.   All this is explained in the movie....but don't forget to put in   docu , or you get another movie, playing god, which is NOT this documentary (docu.)
